title: You know the hints during the loading screen that tell you things....
body:
_**"As the Oathsworn You can help Kalista last hit minions using her W passive, Soul Marked."**_

^ That would be a great one to implement, because apparently NO ONE KNOWS THIS.

I really love playing Kalista, but in the several months that i have been playing her, i have had only 1 support that knows how to use my W passive to help last hit minions _(and he was my friend in a discord chat)_.

its amazing how much more farm you can get _(especially in low elo)_ when 2 people are last hitting instead of 1.
and If you aren't utilising the full potential of her abilities, then youre only playing 80% of the champion, and so are putting yourself at a pointless disadvantage. _(its like playing Azir but never placing a turret..)_

Legit, I often have to teach the support how my ult works... let alone the fricken W passive.

I've just given up now, if they don't know how to use it, ill just deal with it. I'm done explaining it again and again and again...
